Description: Individuals were sampled across sites of known time since last fire. At each site we chose healthy growing individuals.
Measured from base of plant to apex
Plants were harvested, dried and weighed.
Caluclated from using an estimate of LMA and measured leaf biomass.
"LMA was calculated on samples taken from top
column3: middle and base of  plants growing nearby and similar-to those used for biomass measures. LMA was estimated by scanning fresh leaves then weighing and measuring dry mass."

Description: Harvested in the field in semi-open conditions
